response.original_title: Étrangère, je suis venue, étrangère, je repars.
response.overview: This film is based on a text I wrote, drawn from my own experience of living in China, Hong Kong, and Paris. The film explores imprisonment, walls (both tangible and those in our minds), people in exile, and the sharing of nightmares. "One can never escape the walls that confine us: those outside want to enter, those inside want to leave." I attempt to convey this feeling through recurring patterns and non-linear storytelling.
response.title: A Foreigner, I Came, A Foreigner, I Leave.

release_dates.note: Hong Kong On Screen Film Festival
